CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, pg. A12, reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers' ... 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
TitMainTitle: Theresa Weaver wearing dance costume with one long sleeves and sash around waist, and man wearing dark suit, holding arms out, in interior with leaf patterned carpet and marble baseboard for Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
